document.discussion_title: News24.com | LIVE: City of Johannesburg inaugural council meeting
document.topic_text: The EFF has accused the ANC’s Dan Bovu of offering their councillors hundreds of thousands of rands in exchange for votes in the Johannesburg City Council... News24 16 hours ago - Technology [News24Wire] The Economic Freedom Fighters have accused the ANC's Dan Bovu of offering their councillors hundreds of thousands of rands in exchange for votes in... allAfrica.com
